name: tower-route
description: Tiny route component for client and server.

0.0.1.name: tower-route
0.0.1.readme:
# Tower Route

[![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/viatropos/tower-route.png)](http://travis-ci.org/viatropos/tower-route)

## Installation

```
npm install tower-route
```

## Quick Start

``` javascript
var towerRoute = require('tower-route');
```

## Features

## More Information

Follow [@viatropos](http://twitter.com/viatropos) on twitter for updates

## Running Tests

```
git clone git://github.com/viatropos/tower-route.git
cd tower-route
npm install
```

then run the tests:

```
npm test
```

Requires `mocha`, `chai`, and `phantomjs`:

```
brew install phantomjs
npm install mocha -g
npm install phantomjs chai
```

## License

MIT
